name: Vrock
damage_resistances: bludgeoning,piercing,and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks,Demonic Resilience

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The vrock makes one Beak attack and two Talon attacks.

actions.name: Beak
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 12 (2d8+3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Talon
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 14 (2d10+3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Wing Spores (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The vrock shakes a cloud of toxic spores from its wings. Each creature within 15 feet of it must make a DC 15 CON save. On a failure, a creature takes 28 (8d6) poison damage and is poisoned for 1 minute. On a success, a creature takes half the damage and isn't poisoned. While poisoned, a creature takes 3 (1d6) poison damage at the start of each of its turns. A poisoned creature can repeat the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. Emptying a vial of holy water on the poisoned creature also ends the effect on it.

special_abilities.name: Demonic Resilience
special_abilities.desc: The vrock is resistant to cold, fire, and lightning damage. In addition, it is immune to poison damage and to the poisoned condition.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The vrock has advantage on saves against spells and other magical effects.
